reviews.text: I had two Falcons serviced. Great contact with the owner and the work was flawless. A true enthusiast who really knows what he‚Äôs doing. Highly recommended üëå

reviews.text: The case was complicated - it was a Chinese scooter that had been broken since new-but it wasn‚Äôt much of a challenge. It was fixed and brought back to proper condition!

reviews.author: Rados≈Çaw
reviews.text: I wholeheartedly recommend this service. They took on a very difficult scooter repair that no other shop wanted to do. From the very beginning, you could see a professional approach, accurate diagnosis, and real commitment to solving the problem. The repair ended in full success - the scooter works perfectly. Great communication, honest approach, and a high level of technical knowledge. If you‚Äôre looking for experts who aren‚Äôt afraid of challenges, this is definitely the right place.

reviews.author: Szymon
reviews.text: I recommend Poray Electric - quick, straight to the point, and they solved the issues with my Feniks!

reviews.author: Vds
reviews.text: Solid work. Great contact and smooth order process. The machine is top-notch - very powerful and sturdy, holds the road well, and the uphill mode is awesome. Tested on the Tatra mountain trails. Recommended!

reviews.author: Grzegorz
reviews.text: Communication with the company is top-level - extremely professional, clear, and to the point. Great customer contact and openness to non-standard solutions. The bikes are built not only with great aesthetics, but most importantly with a solid engineering approach and broad practical knowledge, which is crucial for long, trouble-free operation. Highly recommended!

reviews.author: Marek
reviews.text: Mr. Filip and this service deserve an A+. Reliable, solid, honest, and very good communication!!! I recommend it with all my heart!!!

reviews.author: Denis
reviews.text: I recommend it to everyone - the service meets all expectations, it‚Äôs affordable and fast, and they work ‚Äúas if for themselves‚Äù. I will definitely come back.

reviews.author: Kamila
reviews.text: Custom-built bike. Mr. Filip helped and advised which components (e.g., fork, rear shock) would be the best. We had an online meeting where he answered all questions and cleared up any doubts. After the build, he also provides service support. Full professionalism and knowledge. Highly recommended! :)

reviews.author: Maciej
reviews.text: A service with huge knowledge and experience. Great communication and a professional, straightforward approach to the customer.
